name: Get to the Sea!
description:
You are a dog who cannot stop, because you must get to the sea.

Get to the Sea!

Controls:
- steer - left/right, A/D, left joystick
- jump - spacebar, controller bottom button
- sprint in a straight line - shift, controller right button, right trigger

Credits:
Dan Bergman - Music and Sound
Matt Woelk - The Rest
